nodes.text: The sister of the Naboo Royal Handmaiden Cordé was a jeweller. When Senator Padmé Amidala, Cordé's employer, was revamping her wardrobe for her second session of the Galactic Senate, Cordé had her sister design and make jewelled pins for Amidala's hair that could double as weapons or tools, yet be small enough to pass most security scans.
Cordé's sister was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Queen's Shadow.
